name: Ball Turret Gunner
overview: Ball Turret Gunner is a game with a first person view where you need to gun down enemy vessels (that look suspiciously like Tie Fighters). You have a direction indicator that tells you where the enemy vessel is coming from, and you can rotate your turret a full 360 degrees. However, your laser takes a long time to recharge, so you must aim carefully and not waste your shots.
